SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 30Examine: 1 dose of Goblin transmogrification potion.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Goblin potionUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Goblin potion(1).pngWeight: 0.020Value: 50Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 9 February 2022Item ID: 26587

A goblin potion is a transmogrification potion made during Land of the Goblins by using an unfinished toadflax potion with Pharmakos berries. The potion, usable only within the Goblin Cave and Goblin Temple, will transform the player into a goblin.

The potion's effects will wear off if "in direct sunlight", the player wears something other than a goblin mail, teleports, or if the player attacks something. It requires 47 Herblore to make the 3-dose potion and yields 55 experience.

Goblin selection[edit | edit source]

After drinking the potion, an interface opens to prompt players to select their appearance as a goblin.

Date Changes
9 March 2022
(update)

Player models will no longer be distorted when transforming into a goblin and then teleporting.

9 February 2022
(update | poll)

The item was added to the game.

A '''goblin potion''' is a transmogrification potion made during [[Land of the Goblins]] by using an [[Toadflax potion (unf)|unfinished toadflax potion]] with [[Pharmakos berries]]. The potion, usable only within the [[Goblin Cave]] and [[Goblin Temple]], will transform the player into a [[goblin]].

The potion's effects will wear off if "in direct sunlight", the player wears something other than a [[goblin mail]], teleports, or if the player attacks something. It requires 47 [[Herblore]] to make the 3-dose potion and yields 55 experience.

==Goblin selection==
After drinking the potion, an interface opens to prompt players to select their appearance as a goblin.
